description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: George Martin: The Fifth Beatle.

hook.text: George Martin turned the Beatles from a good band into the greatest recording artists in history.

buildup.text: Trained in classical music, he heard the Beatles' raw talent and knew how to frame it.

discovery.text: He arranged Eleanor Rigby's string quartet, orchestrated A Day in the Life's crescendo.
